Generate_script_prompt:
Prompt: Give a quick tech news update script in the style of CNBC techcheck briefing as an example.
        Response: I'm Wall-E, and this is your CNBC techcheck Briefing for Monday April 29th. Tesla is asking shareholders to reinstate CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, which a Delaware judge voided earlier this year. The judge ruled that the record-setting compensation deal was, quote, deeply flawed. Tesla also saying it would ask shareholders to approve moving the company's incorporation from Delaware to Texas. The company has hired a proxy solicitor and plans to spend millions of dollars to help secure votes for the two proposals. Apple CEO Tim Cook says the company plans to look at manufacturing in Indonesia following a meeting with the country's president, Cook telling reporters following the meeting that he spoke with the president about his desire to see manufacturing there and that he believes in the country. The comments come as Apple is pushed to diversify its supply chain with more manufacturing outside of China in countries such as Vietnam and India. Shares of ASML falling today as the company missed its sales forecast but stuck to its full-year outlook. Net sales fell over 21 percent year-over-year, while net income dropped over 37 percent. ASML is highly important to the semiconductor industry as it builds machines that are required for manufacturing chips globally. Last year, weaker demand for consumer electronics hit chipmakers that produce for those devices, which has in turn impacted ASML. That's all for today. We'll see you back here tomorrow.

Response:
Script:
i'm wall-e, and this is your ai briefing for wednesday, november 19th. in an unprecedented move, openai has announced their new ai model, gpt-4.5, which promises enhanced natural language understanding and a 20% increase in processing speed compared to its predecessors. the company claims this model will set new standards for ai applications across various industries. openai emphasizes the importance of responsible development and plans to introduce robust guidelines to ensure ethical ai use.

meanwhile, amazon's latest acquisition of zoox, a company specializing in autonomous vehicle technology, is making waves. the tech giant aims to integrate zoox's cutting-edge innovations into its logistics operations, potentially revolutionizing delivery services worldwide. this move affirms amazon's commitment to expanding its footprint in the mobility sector.

in the semiconductor space, nvidia is seeing its shares rise sharply following the announcement of a partnership with samsung to develop advanced gpus. this collaboration aims to leverage samsung's manufacturing capabilities to boost gpu production and meet the growing demand in ai and gaming sectors. the news comes as nvidia continues to strengthen its position as a leader in the tech industry, capitalizing on the significant increase in demand for high-performance computing.

that's all for today. we'll see you back here tomorrow
Polished Script:
"i'm wall-e, welcoming you to today's tech briefing for wednesday, november 19th. openai has made waves with the announcement of its latest ai model, gpt-4.5. this new version boasts enhanced natural language understanding and promises a 20% increase in processing speed. openai states that this development will set new standards across various industries by emphasizing responsible development and introducing guidelines to ensure ethical ai use.

in the mobility sector, amazon's acquisition of zoox, a company at the forefront of autonomous vehicle technology, is garnering significant attention. amazon plans to integrate zoox’s innovations into its logistics operations, potentially transforming delivery services on a global scale. this acquisition highlights amazon’s drive to strengthen its position in the mobility arena.

turning to the semiconductor industry, nvidia's shares are surging following news of its collaboration with samsung. the partnership aims to develop advanced gpus by leveraging samsung's extensive manufacturing capabilities. this move is expected to meet the increasing demand for high-performance computing in ai and gaming sectors, further solidifying nvidia's leadership in the tech industry.

that wraps up today's briefing. we'll be back tomorrow with more updates."
Podcast Title: EP-413 Openai's Gpt-4.5 Unveiled 🤖, Amazon's Zoox Acquisition 🚗, Nvidia & Samsung Team Up 💻
Podcast Description:
```html

i'm wall-e, welcoming you to today's tech briefing for wednesday, november 19th. here's what's making headlines in the tech world today:

  • openai unveils gpt-4.5: the new ai model promises enhanced natural language understanding, boasting a 20% increase in processing speed. openai emphasizes responsible development and ethical use.
  • amazon acquires zoox: the tech giant's acquisition of autonomous vehicle company, zoox, aims to integrate advanced technology into its logistics operations, transforming global delivery services.
  • nvidia & samsung collaboration: nvidia's shares rise with news of a partnership with samsung to develop advanced gpus, leveraging samsung's manufacturing prowess to meet high-performance computing demands in the ai and gaming sectors.

that wraps up today's briefing. we'll be back tomorrow with more updates!

```
